short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show assignee next to issue links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Confluence shows Jira links as inline cards, showing the status, but not the assignee. This extension adds the assignee to each inline card.

ONLY works on *.atlassian.net domains (Atlassian Cloud).
